description.value:
>@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.Pf9uh67LQ85K52AF]{Cache Hacks (Su)}

The technowitch bends reality to their whims with their spell cache, creating a world molded to their desires.

First Slot (6th Level): @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.3MJvj8HOhmqsq2pj]{Flight} (1st level), @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.3yVTzdZy7GIxtk4h]{Incompetence}*, @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.jvJfulZZMmoO3gDs]{Lifting Frame}*, or @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.gNgdSyi4pXQmasmc]{Polymorph} (1st level)
Second Slot (12th Level): @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.cRnYtsbLQzNnIs1n]{Command Undead}*, @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.3MJvj8HOhmqsq2pj]{Flight} (2nd level or lower), @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.gNgdSyi4pXQmasmc]{Polymorph} (2nd level or lower), or @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.jA6eTWFaULIpjXAx]{Spider Climb}
Third Slot (18th Level): @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.3MJvj8HOhmqsq2pj]{Flight} (3rd level or lower), @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.u564kHSvy4CR683Z]{Remote Pilot}*, @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.tcfcgX5n2Z6dFf8A]{Phantom Cycle}, or @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.gNgdSyi4pXQmasmc]{Polymorph} (3rd level or lower)
